main_definition: Primarily or chiefly; in the majority of cases.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Predominantly, typically or generally, but not entirely.
meanings_and_examples.example: I mostly eat vegetarian meals during the week.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Almost entirely; very close to being complete.
meanings_and_examples.example: The project is mostly completed, with only a few minor tasks left.

meanings_and_examples.definition: For the most part or as far as possible; usually or generally.
meanings_and_examples.example: I try to wake up early and exercise mostly every morning.

meanings_and_examples.definition: With little or no exceptions, almost exclusively.
meanings_and_examples.example: The weather is mostly sunny today, with only a few clouds in the sky.
